subject: Football
College Athletics
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Texas quarterback Colt McCoy’s 26-yard touchdown pass to Quan Cosby with 16 seconds left lifted the Longhorns to a victory over the Buckeyes in the Fiesta Bowl.
snippet: Texas quarterback Colt McCoy’s 26-yard touchdown pass to Quan Cosby with 16 seconds left lifted the Longhorns to a victory over the Buckeyes in the Fiesta Bowl.
